name: Kotlin
author: JetBrains
desc: Write better Android apps faster with Kotlin.

name: Jetpack
author: Google
desc: Jetpack is a suite of libraries to help developers follow best practices, reduce boilerplate code, and write code that works consistently across Android versions and devices so that developers can focus on the code they care about.

name: Material Design
author: Google
desc: Material is a design system – backed by open-source code – that helps teams build high-quality digital experiences.

name: FreeReflection
author: tiann
desc: FreeReflection is a library that lets you use reflection without any restriction above Android P (includes Q and R).

name: ViewBindingPropertyDelegate
author: kirich1409
desc: Make work with Android View Binding simpler.
